comments: Professor Frisina is the best professor in csi. He cares about students a lot, and you can see how he loves psychology. Lectures are extremely interesting. There are 3 exams (3-4 chapters each) and final exam which covers just last 3 chapters. And every exam he gives extra 5 points. So definitely recommend to take him!!!

comments: Dr. Frisina is a great professor! Took him for summer classes so the work wasn\'t bad at all! Very informative and engaging! He likes to show the class videos to better understand the material. Test aren\'t that hard if you study and pay attention. There were times where class was boring, but overall a great class and would take him again!
